nodes.text: The Quasar Fire II-class Cruiser-Carrier was a model of Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier used by the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, one such cruiser-carrier flew over a cloudy celestial body, accompanied by TIE/IN interceptors and TIE/d "Defender" Multi-Role Starfighters, while carrying various TIE line starships.

The Quasar Fire II was wedge shaped, with four hangar bays protruding from its rear ventral hull. It also featured sublight engines and measured 340 meters. The ship served as the successor to the Quasar Fire I-class Cruiser-Carrier.
The Quasar Fire II-class Cruiser-Carrier was first mentioned on a card of the same name in the 2017 Imperial Light Carrier Expansion Pack of Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: Armada.
